title: My experience on LoL

replies.body:
Well, I wanna first commend you for noticing that wasn't the best attitude and trying to work on it! The best advice I've been personally given is to try and avoid fighting fire with fire. Heck, even I've needed to take a breather and drag the chat window off the screen before and focus on communicating by using pings. 

Some time ago a Rioter made a pretty good [**infographic of ways to de-stress**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/sZdrHNEP-long-infographic-i-asked-some-rioters-how-they-de-salt-after-a-bad-run-of-games?show=rundown) after a match that might be worth looking over as well. Best of luck on the Rift!
